newsitem.title: USA: Remedy sees Q3 EPS of about $0.30 a share.
newsitem.headline: Remedy sees Q3 EPS of about $0.30 a share.

text.p: Remedy Corp said Tuesday it expected to report third-quarter earnings per share of about $0.30 a share, exceeding analysts' expectations.
The company also said in a statement it expected to beat analysts' revenue forecasts for the quarter ended September 30.
Analysts had predicted the company would earn $0.24 a share, according to the First Call consensus. The company posted EPS of $0.15 in the year-ago period.
The company said revenue from the U.S. government, Europe and its NT family of products was higher than expected.

Remedy also announced a two-for-one stock split. It will take the form of a stock dividend entitling each shareholder of record on October 14 to receive two shares for every one share of common stock held. The stock split take effect October 25.
After the split the company will have about 26.6 million shares of common stock outstanding.
